languages.text: "Ты больше не следуешь букве Лекс Империалис, и твое предложение по десятине Коронуса тому доказательство. Я прав{mf||а}?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
languages.original_text: "Ты больше не следуешь букве Лекс Империалис, и твое предложение по десятине Коронуса тому доказательство. Я прав{mf||а}?"

traits.locale_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"
"You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

languages.text: 「君はもう、レックス・インペリアの文言通りには従っていない。このエクスパンスの租税の扱いに関する君の提案が、その証拠だ。そうだろう？」
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: 「君はもう、レックス・インペリアの文言通りには従っていない。このエクスパンスの租税の扱いに関する君の提案が、その証拠だ。そうだろう？」

languages.text: "Ihr folgt nicht länger dem Lex Imperia, und Euer Vorschlag, was mit dem Zehnt der Ausdehnung geschehen soll, beweist es. Habe ich recht?"
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr folgt nicht länger dem Lex Imperia, und Euer Vorschlag, was mit dem Zehnt der Ausdehnung geschehen soll, beweist es. Habe ich recht?"

languages.text: « Vous ne respectez plus la Lex Imperialis à la lettre, comme le prouve votre proposition concernant l'avenir de la dîme. C'est bien cela ? »
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez renoncé à suivre la Lex Imperialis, comme le prouve votre proposition concernant l'avenir de la dîme. C'est bien cela ? »

languages.text: «Usted ya no sigue a rajatabla la Lex Imperialis, y su propuesta sobre el destino del diezmo de la Extensión lo demuestra. ¿Me equivoco?».
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: «Usted ya no sigue a rajatabla la Lex Imperialis, y su propuesta sobre el destino del diezmo de la Extensión lo demuestra. ¿Me equivoco?».

languages.text: “你已经不再遵守帝国律法了。你关于科罗努斯扩区什一税的提议，已经证明了这一点。我说得对吗？”
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: “你已经不再遵守帝国律法了。你关于科罗努斯扩区什一税的提议，已经证明了这一点。我说得对吗？”

languages.text: "Artık Lex İmperialis'in kelamına uymuyorsun. Enginlik'in aşarının kaderiyle ilgili yaptığın teklif de bunun en büyük kanıtı. Yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "You no longer follow the letter of the Lex Imperialis, and your proposal regarding the fate of the Expanse's tithe proves it. Am I correct?"

traits.locale_text: "Artık Lex Imperialis'in kelâmına uymuyorsun. Enginlik'in aşarının kaderiyle ilgili yaptığın teklif de bunun en büyük kanıtı. Yanılıyor muyum?"
